subject: DM
title: Product Development Planning and Execution
description:
This course deals with the effective product development project management. The scope is multidisciplinary: we will cover both the analytical (quantitative) and qualitative aspects of how to best run product development projects. It introduces concepts that a development project manager of engineering should know about. It only briefly covers how to manage the whole product design development process.
* Linking project selection to technology strategy
* How to screen and select projects
* How to monitor and review their progress
* Resource allocation among projects, timing and links, concurrent engineering 
* How to staff and lead projects
* When to kill a project
* Post-project review and learning
